main.sprites.enemies

Interface Enemy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Goomba

    public interface Enemy
    Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
    Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
    Class Description:

    Interface which must be implemented by every Enemy in game. All Enemies must also be added to ENEMIES ArrayList in SpriteHandler class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attemptAttack()
      Action to perform if enemy touches Mario (This check must be included in this code block).
      This must include any checks necessary to ensure that the collision between player and enemy satisfied whatever conditions to kill player.
      void completeCycle()
      Action to perform if Mario stomps the Enemy.
      void destroy()
      Removes enemy from parent and frees up memory resources.
      void fireballHit()
      Action to perform if hit by Mario's fireball.
      boolean getCycleStatus() 
      javafx.scene.shape.SVGPath[] getSpriteBoundsArray()
      Returns the Array containing SVGPath Collision Data of Enemy.
      javafx.scene.image.ImageView getSpriteFrame() 
      int getZone()
      Used to check if the enemy should be included in collision detection/logic execution loop.
      void update()
      Enemy Logic.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update()
        Enemy Logic. Executed by GameLoop class.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Removes enemy from parent and frees up memory resources. Must be called only when the enemy cycle has been completed.

      • completeCycle

        void completeCycle()
        Action to perform if Mario stomps the Enemy.

      • getCycleStatus

        boolean getCycleStatus()
        Returns:
        True if the Enemy has completed its cycle (died or fell in pit); otherwise False.

      • attemptAttack

        void attemptAttack()
        Action to perform if enemy touches Mario (This check must be included in this code block).
        This must include any checks necessary to ensure that the collision between player and enemy satisfied whatever conditions to kill player.

      • fireballHit

        void fireballHit()
        Action to perform if hit by Mario's fireball.

      • getZone

        int getZone()
        Used to check if the enemy should be included in collision detection/logic execution loop. The zone must match the zone in which player resides for inclusion in collision detection.
        Returns:
        The stage zone in which Enemy resides. Please see class StageFloorBase for details on zones.

      • getSpriteFrame

        javafx.scene.image.ImageView getSpriteFrame()
        Returns:
        ImageView containing enemy image on stage.

      • getSpriteBoundsArray

        javafx.scene.shape.SVGPath[] getSpriteBoundsArray()
        Returns the Array containing SVGPath Collision Data of Enemy. The element-specific data is as follows:
        Element 0: Top
        Element 1: Right
        Element 2: Bottom
        Element 3: Left
        Element 4: Hit Box
        Any more consecutive arrays would contain special condition-specific collision data (if any). It is possible for members of array to be null (for example, if you only need to check for top and right collisions, make others null).
        Returns:
        Array containing collision data for enemy.
